What do you need money for?  You can free buy stats by repeatedly clicking
with both left and right mouse buttons on the buy button.

-----Original Message-----

>> i was wondering if there was a faster way to get money then to use
 the ctr-+ method?

>Yea, go to the files section here and download dph's torture set.
Then complete level #401, making sure to acquire all the gold.  If
that scenario doesn't give you enough money, . . (lol) . . nothing
will.
